Photo Editing Guide

Editing Standards

  • START HOLDS, VOLUMES, ARETES, ETC.. (hand & foot) are CIRCLED with GREEN MARKINGS

  • INTERMEDIARY HOLDS, VOLUMES, ARETES, ETC.. are CIRCLED with BLUE MARKINGS

  • FINISH HOLDS, VOLUMES, TAPE BOXES, ETC.. are BOXED with RED MARKINGS
